name: peterborough-fences-calculator
description: A calculator for Peterborough Fences pricing

scripts.release: npm run build && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") dist/* -t "Peterborough Fences Calculator v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" -n "This is the release for version $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version'). Includes bug fixes and improvements."
scripts.bump-and-release: git add -A && git commit -m "Auto-commit before release" && npm version patch && npm run release && git push && git push --tags

author: Noman Qayum
